roleset.name: deteriorate, become unable to compensate for a deficiency

example.name: decompensate-v
example.text: Accommodative esotropia decompensated to cyclic esotropia in a 6-year-old boy.

example.name: decompensation-n: args 2, 3
example.text: Coronary vascular mechanisms involved in decompensation from hypertrophy to heart failure.

example.name: decompensation-n: with arg0
example.text: The prevention of metabolic decompensation from the "stress" of illness and surgery is a key goal in the management of diabetes in the hospitalized patient.
example.arg: from the "stress" of illness and surgery
